segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!
segments.translated_content: 大家好！

segments.content: This week, we welcome **2 new contributors** to help **ensure the continuity of the newsletter** throughout the year, even when Seb takes a break.
segments.sourceMdx: This week, we welcome **2 new contributors** to help **ensure the continuity of the newsletter** throughout the year, even when Seb takes a break.
segments.translated_content: 本周，我们迎来了**两位新贡献者**加入，他们将协助**确保这份简报在全年持续更新**，即使Seb休假时也不例外。

segments.content: **Cyril and Matthieu from [Theodo Apps (formerly BAM)](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** here 👋, filling in to bring you the latest news from the React and React Native worlds.
segments.sourceMdx: **Cyril and Matthieu from [Theodo Apps (formerly BAM)](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** here 👋, filling in to bring you the latest news from the React and React Native worlds.
segments.translated_content: 我们是来自[Theodo Apps（原BAM）](https://apps.theodo.com/en?utm_source=thisweekinreact)的**Cyril和Matthieu** 👋，本期由我们为大家带来React和React Native领域的最新动态。

segments.content: It’s a relatively calm week for React, with some ongoing discussions about the Suspense drama in React 19.
segments.sourceMdx: It’s a relatively calm week for React, with some ongoing discussions about the Suspense drama in React 19.
segments.translated_content: 本周React方面相对平静，主要围绕React 19中Suspense相关争议的持续讨论。

segments.content:
**But React Native? That’s where the real action is!**\
From Expo demoing a way to integrate React DOM components to the exciting launch of React Native WebGPU, there’s plenty to talk about. Plus, we’re diving into new approaches to native module development that are sure to shake things up. And React Native 0.75 is around the corner, we'll cover it next week!
segments.sourceMdx:
**But React Native? That’s where the real action is!**\
From Expo demoing a way to integrate React DOM components to the exciting launch of React Native WebGPU, there’s plenty to talk about. Plus, we’re diving into new approaches to native module development that are sure to shake things up. And React Native 0.75 is around the corner, we'll cover it next week!
segments.translated_content:
**但React Native领域可谓精彩纷呈！**\
从Expo演示如何集成React DOM组件，到激动人心的React Native WebGPU发布，亮点不断。此外，我们还将探讨可能颠覆传统开发模式的原生模块新方案。React Native 0.75版本也即将发布，下周我们将重点报道！

segments.content: Our partner conf **[reactjsday](https://2024.reactjsday.it/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** (🇮🇹 Verona - 25 October) is celebrating its 10th year by upgrading to 2 tracks (16 talks). Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR". Great speakers have already been announced: Matheus Albuquerque, Aurora Scharff, Dani Coll, and more!
segments.sourceMdx: Our partner conf **[reactjsday](https://2024.reactjsday.it/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)** (🇮🇹 Verona - 25 October) is celebrating its 10th year by upgrading to 2 tracks (16 talks). Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR". Great speakers have already been announced: Matheus Albuquerque, Aurora Scharff, Dani Coll, and more!
segments.translated_content: 我们的合作会议**[reactjsday](https://2024.reactjsday.it/?utm_source=thisweekinreact)**（🇮🇹 维罗纳 - 10月25日）迎来十周年庆典，今年升级为双轨道（16场演讲）。使用优惠码"TWIR"可享9折。已公布的重磅演讲嘉宾包括：Matheus Albuquerque、Aurora Scharff、Dani Coll等！

segments.content: **[Make the most of your design system with StackBlitz](https://stackblitz.com/design-systems?utm_source=twir\&utm_medium=primary)**
segments.sourceMdx: **[Make the most of your design system with StackBlitz](https://stackblitz.com/design-systems?utm_source=twir&utm_medium=primary)**
segments.translated_content: **[通过StackBlitz最大化设计系统价值](https://stackblitz.com/design-systems?utm_source=twir&utm_medium=primary)**

segments.content: Your design system makes web development more efficient and consistent, but we know that building and maintaining it comes with no shortage of challenges. [**StackBlitz**](https://stackblitz.com/) **makes design systems easier to *evangelize*, *maintain*, and *evolve***. With StackBlitz you can:
segments.sourceMdx: Your design system makes web development more efficient and consistent, but we know that building and maintaining it comes with no shortage of challenges. [**StackBlitz**](https://stackblitz.com/) **makes design systems easier to _evangelize_, _maintain_, and _evolve_**. With StackBlitz you can:
segments.translated_content: 设计系统能提升开发效率和一致性，但其构建和维护过程充满挑战。[**StackBlitz**](https://stackblitz.com/) **让设计系统更易于_推广_、_维护_和_演进_**。通过StackBlitz您可以：

segments.content:
* 📈 **Increase adoption rates**: Provide one-click instant environments your team can use to try internal libraries.
* 💻 **Elevate developer experience:** Include live code examples in your documentation.
* 🐛 **Improve bug reporting**: Instantly filter out true issues and never spin up heavy local installations for a simple bug report *ever again*.
* 🤝 **Simplify collaboration**: Facilitate seamless collaborations across engineering, design, and other departments.
segments.sourceMdx:
- 📈 **Increase adoption rates**: Provide one-click instant environments your team can use to try internal libraries.
- 💻 **Elevate developer experience:** Include live code examples in your documentation.
- 🐛 **Improve bug reporting**: Instantly filter out true issues and never spin up heavy local installations for a simple bug report _ever again_.
- 🤝 **Simplify collaboration**: Facilitate seamless collaborations across engineering, design, and other departments.
segments.translated_content:
- 📈 **提升采用率**：提供一键式即时环境供团队试用内部库
- 💻 **优化开发者体验**：在文档中嵌入实时代码示例
- 🐛 **改进缺陷报告**：即时过滤真实问题，从此告别为简单缺陷搭建笨重本地环境
- 🤝 **简化协作流程**：促进工程、设计等多部门无缝协作

segments.content: **Ready to transform your design system workflow?** [Get started now](https://stackblitz.com/design-systems)!
segments.sourceMdx: **Ready to transform your design system workflow?** [Get started now](https://stackblitz.com/design-systems)!
segments.translated_content: **准备好革新设计系统工作流了吗？** [立即开始](https://stackblitz.com/design-systems)！

segments.content: ## ⚛️ React
segments.sourceMdx: ## ⚛️ React {#react}
segments.translated_content: ## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.content:
* 💸 [Chromatic – Visual testing for Storybook, Playwright, and Cypress. Catch UI bugs that functional tests miss. Lightning-fast & zero flake.](https://www.chromatic.com/features/visual-test?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=quick_link\&utm_campaign=q3_2024)
* 👀 [React 19 - Disabling prerendering siblings of suspended components breaking common pattern](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898): The React team is working on reversing this change that was planned to be included in React 19 but would have degraded the performance of lots of SPAs. No ETA yet, it may take some time to get a stable React 19 release
* 🐦 [Matt Pocock has a suggestion for a new approach to library typings](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821124980043636841): React could for instance expose `useState` types with TypeScript namespaces
* 🐦 [Matt](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821926395380986219) [Pocock](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821124980043636841)['s tip to add auto-completion to your component props](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821926395380986219): Using `string & {}`
* 📜 [A deep dive on forms with modern React](https://www.epicreact.dev/react-forms): Kent explains how to use the new hooks `​​useFormStatus`, `useActionState` and `useOptimistic`
* 📜 [How Jotai was born](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/how-jotai-was-born/): Daishi Kato recaps his multiple iterations on state management libraries before creating Jotai
* 📜 [Why using dependency injection in your app can lead to cleaner and easier to maintain code](https://codedrivendevelopment.com/posts/dependency-injection-in-react): A valuable article that encourages thoughtful consideration of DI in frontend development, especially for those working on more complex React projects
* 📜 [Building an App with Next.js and Electron with Server Components Support](https://www.saybackend.com/blog/03-electron-nextjs-ssr): Explains how to hijack Next.js to run an RSC server in an Electron app
* 📜 [Optimizing SPA load times with async chunks preloading](https://mmazzarolo.com/blog/2024-08-13-async-chunk-preloading-on-load/)
* 📜 [What is a Component Library and Should You Build Your Own?](https://component-odyssey.com/articles/10-what-is-a-library-should-you-build-your-own)
* 📦 [Docusaurus 3.5 - Authors pages and many new blogging features](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/3.5)
* 📦 [Impact-React in RC - Signals for React, by CodeSandbox](https://impact-react.dev)
* 📦 [Plunk - New OSS email platform, with react-email and jsx-email integrations](https://www.useplunk.com/)
* 📦 [react-switchboard - Quickly create custom DevTools for your apps](https://github.com/coryhouse/react-switchboard)
* 📦 [react-call - Imperatively display React Components and await their result](https://github.com/desko27/react-call): An interesting idea to simplify implementing confirmation dialogs, toasters…
* 📦 [@lazarv/react-server - An alternative framework with Server Components](https://react-server.dev/)
* 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - We React to State of React Survey](https://syntax.fm/show/805/we-react-to-state-of-react-survey)
* 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - CSS Components: Tailwind, Panda, Scoped, Modules, Classes, Variables, CSS-in-JS and Sprinkles!](https://syntax.fm/show/807/css-components-tailwind-panda-scoped-modules-classes-variables-css-in-js-and-sprinkles)
* 🎥 [Sam Selikoff - Avoid premature abstraction with Unstyled Components](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9iJK-Vl6PhE)
segments.sourceMdx:
- 💸 [Chromatic – Visual testing for Storybook, Playwright, and Cypress. Catch UI bugs that functional tests miss. Lightning-fast & zero flake.](https://www.chromatic.com/features/visual-test?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=quick_link&utm_campaign=q3_2024)
- 👀 [React 19 - Disabling prerendering siblings of suspended components breaking common pattern](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898): The React team is working on reversing this change that was planned to be included in React 19 but would have degraded the performance of lots of SPAs. No ETA yet, it may take some time to get a stable React 19 release
- 🐦 [Matt Pocock has a suggestion for a new approach to library typings](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821124980043636841): React could for instance expose `useState` types with TypeScript namespaces
- 🐦 [Matt](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821926395380986219) [Pocock](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821124980043636841)['s tip to add auto-completion to your component props](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821926395380986219): Using `string & {}`
- 📜 [A deep dive on forms with modern React](https://www.epicreact.dev/react-forms): Kent explains how to use the new hooks `​​useFormStatus`, `useActionState` and `useOptimistic`
- 📜 [How Jotai was born](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/how-jotai-was-born/): Daishi Kato recaps his multiple iterations on state management libraries before creating Jotai
- 📜 [Why using dependency injection in your app can lead to cleaner and easier to maintain code](https://codedrivendevelopment.com/posts/dependency-injection-in-react): A valuable article that encourages thoughtful consideration of DI in frontend development, especially for those working on more complex React projects
- 📜 [Building an App with Next.js and Electron with Server Components Support](https://www.saybackend.com/blog/03-electron-nextjs-ssr): Explains how to hijack Next.js to run an RSC server in an Electron app
- 📜 [Optimizing SPA load times with async chunks preloading](https://mmazzarolo.com/blog/2024-08-13-async-chunk-preloading-on-load/)
- 📜 [What is a Component Library and Should You Build Your Own?](https://component-odyssey.com/articles/10-what-is-a-library-should-you-build-your-own)
- 📦 [Docusaurus 3.5 - Authors pages and many new blogging features](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/3.5)
- 📦 [Impact-React in RC - Signals for React, by CodeSandbox](https://impact-react.dev)
- 📦 [Plunk - New OSS email platform, with react-email and jsx-email integrations](https://www.useplunk.com/)
- 📦 [react-switchboard - Quickly create custom DevTools for your apps](https://github.com/coryhouse/react-switchboard)
- 📦 [react-call - Imperatively display React Components and await their result](https://github.com/desko27/react-call): An interesting idea to simplify implementing confirmation dialogs, toasters…
- 📦 [@lazarv/react-server - An alternative framework with Server Components](https://react-server.dev/)
- 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - We React to State of React Survey](https://syntax.fm/show/805/we-react-to-state-of-react-survey)
- 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - CSS Components: Tailwind, Panda, Scoped, Modules, Classes, Variables, CSS-in-JS and Sprinkles!](https://syntax.fm/show/807/css-components-tailwind-panda-scoped-modules-classes-variables-css-in-js-and-sprinkles)
- 🎥 [Sam Selikoff - Avoid premature abstraction with Unstyled Components](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9iJK-Vl6PhE)
segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [Chromatic – Storybook、Playwright 和 Cypress 的可视化测试工具。捕捉功能测试遗漏的 UI 缺陷。闪电般快速且零误报。](https://www.chromatic.com/features/visual-test?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=quick_link&utm_campaign=q3_2024)
- 👀 [React 19 - 禁用 Suspense 组件兄弟节点的预渲染将破坏常见模式](https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/29898): React 团队正在撤销这项原计划纳入 React 19 的变更，该变更会导致大量单页应用性能下降。目前尚无明确发布时间，稳定版 React 19 可能还需等待
- 🐦 [Matt Pocock 提出库类型声明的新思路](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821124980043636841): 例如 React 可以通过 TypeScript 命名空间暴露 `useState` 类型
- 🐦 [Matt Pocock 的组件属性自动补全技巧](https://x.com/mattpocockuk/status/1821926395380986219): 使用 `string & {}` 语法
- 📜 [现代 React 表单深度解析](https://www.epicreact.dev/react-forms): Kent 讲解如何运用新钩子 `useFormStatus`、`useActionState` 和 `useOptimistic`
- 📜 [Jotai 的诞生历程](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/how-jotai-was-born/): Daishi Kato 回顾他创建状态管理库的多次迭代过程
- 📜 [依赖注入如何使前端代码更清晰易维护](https://codedrivendevelopment.com/posts/dependency-injection-in-react): 对复杂 React 项目极具参考价值的 DI 实践指南
- 📜 [构建支持服务器组件的 Next.js + Electron 应用](https://www.saybackend.com/blog/03-electron-nextjs-ssr): 详解在 Electron 中运行 RSC 服务器的实现方案
- 📜 [通过异步代码块预加载优化 SPA 加载速度](https://mmazzarolo.com/blog/2024-08-13-async-chunk-preloading-on-load/)
- 📜 [组件库是什么？你需要自建吗？](https://component-odyssey.com/articles/10-what-is-a-library-should-you-build-your-own)
- 📦 [Docusaurus 3.5 - 作者页面与多项博客新功能](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/3.5)
- 📦 [Impact-React RC 版 - CodeSandbox 出品的 React 信号方案](https://impact-react.dev)
- 📦 [Plunk - 集成 react-email 和 jsx-email 的新开源邮件平台](https://www.useplunk.com/)
- 📦 [react-switchboard - 快速创建应用专属 DevTools](https://github.com/coryhouse/react-switchboard)
- 📦 [react-call - 命令式调用 React 组件并等待结果](https://github.com/desko27/react-call): 简化确认对话框、消息提示等场景的有趣方案
- 📦 [@lazarv/react-server - 支持服务器组件的替代框架](https://react-server.dev/)
- 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - 我们对《React 现状调研》的回应](https://syntax.fm/show/805/we-react-to-state-of-react-survey)
- 🎙️ [Syntax.fm - CSS 组件方案全景：Tailwind、Panda、Scoped、Modules、Classes、Variables、CSS-in-JS 和 Sprinkles](https://syntax.fm/show/807/css-components-tailwind-panda-scoped-modules-classes-variables-css-in-js-and-sprinkles)
- 🎥 [Sam Selikoff - 用无样式组件避免过早抽象](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9iJK-Vl6PhE)

segments.content: The feature management, A/B testing, and product analytics tools used by OpenAI, Notion, & Brex. Build better products by measuring everything you ship 🚀
segments.sourceMdx: The feature management, A/B testing, and product analytics tools used by OpenAI, Notion, & Brex. Build better products by measuring everything you ship 🚀
segments.translated_content: OpenAI、Notion和Brex等公司采用的功能管理、A/B测试与产品分析工具。通过量化每项功能发布效果，打造更出色的产品 🚀

segments.content: Install Statsig once and get:
segments.sourceMdx: Install Statsig once and get:
segments.translated_content: 集成Statsig即可获得：

segments.content: 🧪 **A/B Testing:** Automated experiments with advanced stats. Ship only the features that work
segments.sourceMdx: 🧪 **A/B Testing:** Automated experiments with advanced stats. Ship only the features that work
segments.translated_content: 🧪 **A/B测试：** 具备高级统计的自动化实验，仅上线真正有效的功能

segments.content: 🚩 **Feature Flags:** Unlimited free flags and turn any flag into an A/B test with one click
segments.sourceMdx: 🚩 **Feature Flags:** Unlimited free flags and turn any flag into an A/B test with one click
segments.translated_content: 🚩 **功能开关：** 无限量免费功能开关，一键将任何开关转为A/B测试

segments.content: 🥇 **Product Analytics:** Track growth and measure feature impact. Conduct analysis by feature flag or A/B test group
segments.sourceMdx: 🥇 **Product Analytics:** Track growth and measure feature impact. Conduct analysis by feature flag or A/B test group
segments.translated_content: 🥇 **产品分析：** 追踪增长指标并衡量功能影响，支持按功能开关或A/B测试组细分分析

segments.content: 🎥 **Session Replays:** Replay user interactions to understand experiences and frictions
segments.sourceMdx: 🎥 **Session Replays:** Replay user interactions to understand experiences and frictions
segments.translated_content: 🎥 **会话回放：** 重现用户交互过程，洞察体验痛点

segments.content: 🌐 **Web Analytics:** Drop a JS snippet for essential website metrics and dashboards
segments.sourceMdx: 🌐 **Web Analytics:** Drop a JS snippet for essential website metrics and dashboards
segments.translated_content: 🌐 **网站分析：** 通过JS代码片段获取核心网站指标与可视化看板

segments.content: Get up to 2M free-tier events and 10K session recordings — [**all for free**](https://statsig.com/?utm_campaign=this-week-in-react\&utm_source=sponsorships\&utm_medium=email\&utm_content=website)**!**

segments.content: ## 📱 React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
segments.translated_content: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.content: [![React Native WebGPU](/emails/issues/196/rn-webgpu.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)
segments.sourceMdx: [![React Native WebGPU](/emails/issues/196/rn-webgpu.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)
segments.translated_content: [![React Native WebGPU](/emails/issues/196/rn-webgpu.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)

segments.content: **🎥 [React Native WebGPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)**
segments.sourceMdx: **🎥 [React Native WebGPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)**
segments.translated_content: **🎥 [React Native WebGPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i-DGY98cTjk)**

segments.content:
React Native WebGPU has just launched, offering a unified API to leverage the GPU for advanced graphics and computation in React Native! By reusing the Web API standard, we will be able to easily integrate existing WebGPU code samples and libraries, such as ThreeJS, directly into React Native.
Beyond just graphics, React Native WebGPU can be used for tasks like matrix computations, making it interesting for on-device machine learning algorithms. It's built using Nitro Modules for smooth Typescript to C++ interoperability. Currently, it's available in technical preview, signaling exciting developments ahead!
segments.sourceMdx:
React Native WebGPU has just launched, offering a unified API to leverage the GPU for advanced graphics and computation in React Native! By reusing the Web API standard, we will be able to easily integrate existing WebGPU code samples and libraries, such as ThreeJS, directly into React Native.
Beyond just graphics, React Native WebGPU can be used for tasks like matrix computations, making it interesting for on-device machine learning algorithms. It's built using Nitro Modules for smooth Typescript to C++ interoperability. Currently, it's available in technical preview, signaling exciting developments ahead!
segments.translated_content:
React Native WebGPU正式发布！这项技术通过复用Web API标准，为React Native提供了调用GPU进行高级图形渲染与计算的统一接口。开发者可直接集成现有WebGPU代码示例和类库（如ThreeJS）到React Native应用中。
除了图形处理，React Native WebGPU还能用于矩阵运算等场景，为设备端机器学习算法提供了新可能。该技术采用Nitro Modules实现TypeScript到C++的无缝互操作，目前处于技术预览阶段，预示着激动人心的技术前景！

segments.content: **The Future of React Native Modules**
segments.sourceMdx: **The Future of React Native Modules**
segments.translated_content: **React Native模块的未来演进**

segments.content: Exciting times for React Native developers! Marc Rousavy is shaking things up with NitroModules, a new way to write native code 📦 [that’s blowing away existing solutions in speed tests](https://github.com/mrousavy/NitroBenchmarks). He's encountered some limitations with JSI in VisionCamera. The project is already stable on the C++ side and is already being used in various projects like 🐦 [react-native-unistyles](https://x.com/jpudysz/status/1822541758137303233) and react-native-webgpu, with Swift and Kotlin bindings still in progress.
segments.sourceMdx: Exciting times for React Native developers! Marc Rousavy is shaking things up with NitroModules, a new way to write native code 📦 [that’s blowing away existing solutions in speed tests](https://github.com/mrousavy/NitroBenchmarks). He's encountered some limitations with JSI in VisionCamera. The project is already stable on the C++ side and is already being used in various projects like 🐦 [react-native-unistyles](https://x.com/jpudysz/status/1822541758137303233) and react-native-webgpu, with Swift and Kotlin bindings still in progress.
segments.translated_content: React Native开发者迎来重大革新！Marc Rousavy推出的NitroModules彻底改变了原生代码编写方式📦 [性能测试全面超越现有方案](https://github.com/mrousavy/NitroBenchmarks)。他在VisionCamera项目中发现了JSI的局限性。目前C++端已趋稳定，正被应用于🐦 [react-native-unistyles](https://x.com/jpudysz/status/1822541758137303233)和react-native-webgpu等项目，Swift与Kotlin绑定仍在开发中。

segments.content: 👀 [Meanwhile, a new proposal to push the use of Swift for TurboModules has landed.](https://github.com/okwasniewski/discussions-and-proposals/blob/22edd2c7853aaf2ee654b57f4521e43d668103fb/proposals/0000-swift-turbo-modules.md) These changes will ease native modules development by moving away from Objective-C and C++. With these updates, building native modules is about to get a whole lot better!
segments.sourceMdx: 👀 [Meanwhile, a new proposal to push the use of Swift for TurboModules has landed.](https://github.com/okwasniewski/discussions-and-proposals/blob/22edd2c7853aaf2ee654b57f4521e43d668103fb/proposals/0000-swift-turbo-modules.md) These changes will ease native modules development by moving away from Objective-C and C++. With these updates, building native modules is about to get a whole lot better!
segments.translated_content: 👀 [与此同时，一份推动Swift开发TurboModules的新提案已提交](https://github.com/okwasniewski/discussions-and-proposals/blob/22edd2c7853aaf2ee654b57f4521e43d668103fb/proposals/0000-swift-turbo-modules.md)。通过弃用Objective-C和C++，这些改进将大幅降低原生模块开发门槛。技术升级即将带来更高效的开发体验！

segments.content:
* 💸 [Galaxies.dev - Become an expert React Native Developer & Save $65 before price increases next Tuesday!](https://galaxies.dev/subscription?utm_campaign=announcement\&utm_medium=price-updates\&utm_source=thisweekinreact.com)
* 👀 [React Native 0.76 will likely bump the minimum iOS version to 15.1](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/812)
* 👀 [“use dom” - Expo is working on a way to seamlessly integrate React Web components in React Native apps](https://docs.expo.dev/guides/dom-components/): New experimental Expo feature allows importing React DOM components, communicating with them with props and callbacks! The components are rendered with webviews and not native views, so it will probably be most useful for migrations or secondary features
* 👀 [React Native Screens 4.0 beta](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.0.0-beta.0): With iOS custom detents & Android form sheets
* 👀 [Upcoming Autolinking performance benefits shipping in React Native 0.75 & Expo SDK 51](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/814)
* 📖 [Expo Docs update - Unit testing with Jest](https://docs.expo.dev/develop/unit-testing/): Now explains how to set up jest-expo and React Native Testing Library
* 🗓️ [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) -  🇵🇱 Wrocław - Sept 5-6. Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR". Speakers: Dan Abramov, Evan Bacon, Kent C. Dodds, Delba Oliveira...
* 📜 [Cocoapods is officially in maintenance mode](https://blog.cocoapods.org/CocoaPods-Support-Plans/): React Native will need to migrate at some point
* 📦 [react-native-macos support for RN 0.74 is out](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-macos/releases/tag/v0.74.1)
* 🎥 [Reactiiive - Building a Story List UI with Reanimated (React Native)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NNRym_f8JsA)
* 🎥 [Simon Grimm - React Native Firebase Authentication with Expo Router](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BsOik6ycGqk)
* 🎙️ [RNR 303 - Stories from Chain React 2024](https://www.reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-303-stories-from-chain-react-2024)

- 📜 [Cocoapods正式进入维护模式](https://blog.cocoapods.org/CocoaPods-Support-Plans/)：React Native未来需迁移
